description:
While Hasebe is away on an expedition, Kikkou Sadamune and Sengo Muramasa compete to see who will take care of Master in his place. Hirano finds Uguisumaru writing about Ookanehira and asks to learn more about the newcomer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: August: So Let`s Keep This a Secret, Okay?
Hazuki: Kono Koto wa Himitsu Dakara na
葉月 このことは秘密だからな
